gate4_phase_a_summary.narrative: Story 6 validation encountered critical issues during structural checks. Check D (Test Pass Rates) cannot proceed because test output data is unavailable - this indicates Gate 2 Phase C (test execution) either did not run or did not populate the required test output metadata. Additionally, Check C (AC Traceability) found that all 7 P0 acceptance criteria lack associated test coverage. Check J (Coverage Validation) shows 0% coverage on the touched file (src/async_crud_mcp/cli/setup_cmd.py), well below the 80% threshold.
gate4_phase_a_summary.remediation_path: Story 6 requires re-execution of Gate 2 to ensure test output is captured, and P0 acceptance criteria must be traced to specific test cases.
